channel.title: Comments on: Ernest Batchelder & The Roebling Building

item.title: By: Kim Cooper
item.dc:creator: Kim Cooper
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/08/01/ernest-batchelder-the-roebling-building/#comment-40">Erica</a>.
While this space is not currently open to the public, Esotouric usually is able to visit the Dutch Chocolate Shop on the tour <a href="https://esotouric.com/lowdown/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">The Lowdown on Downtown</a>.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Erica.

While this space is not currently open to the public, Esotouric usually is able to visit the Dutch Chocolate Shop on the tour The Lowdown on Downtown.

item.title: By: Erica
item.dc:creator: Erica
item.description:
Hi! Is it still possible to go see the tile at the Chocolate Shop?
Thank you.
item.content:encoded:
Hi! Is it still possible to go see the tile at the Chocolate Shop?

Thank you.
